content.rendered:
Seekers Spiritual Programs

Intensives ♦ Seminars ♦ Retreats

Intensives

(Seekers Spiritual Development)

Each Intensive is empowered by the divine will of Pujya Guruji

Coming soon…

Seminars

Joint Gathering of Seekers & Enlightened Gurus

Names of the Seminars:

  • GEOKC Bhakti Path
  • Seminar with GEOKC Community and Culture
  • GEOKC Gurus Knowledge
  • Vegan and Organic Food
  • Seminar with study of Holy Gita
  • More Seminars

Special Invitation on:
Ashram Events

Participate in:
GEOKC Vaishnava events
